text:
Hotsuit is a fitness apparel and accessories brand. It is designed to make the wearer sweat profusely. It is intended for use in sports however, it has become commonly worn in other contexts.
Background.
Dopamine is a hormone and a neurotransmitter that plays several important roles in the body. Moving the body generates Dopamine. Hotsuit has been developed to sweat and secrete dopamine. It is being made by Ageas Inc., a subsidiary of American Sporting Goods Co. Ltd.
In 2015, Ageas Inc. established the brand Hotsuit where hot+suit is recognizable with a vision for the brand that exists to create the global sweatsuit market. In 2009, Hotsuit opened its first store in Beijing, China and sponsored the Vertical Marathon of Beijing.
Hotsuits are being sold both in retail stores and online markets like Amazon, Aliexprss, Tmall.
In popular culture.
Hotsuit has been seen in the TV series "Ode to Joy" and "Our Glamorous Time". "The Fighter" and "Hello Mr. Billionaire" movies have scenes with Hotsuit.
